name: Elkus and Sisson
tag_list: denverdivorceattorney, denvercriminalattorney, denverdivorceattorneys, denvercriminalattorneys, criminalattorney, divorceattorney
overview:
The Denver law firm of Elkus & Sisson, P.C. provides legal assistance to people with all sorts of legal issues. Specializing as Denver Divorce and Criminal Attorneys, they also assist clients with all types of legal issues. Their practice areas include:

Criminal Law: Violent Crimes, Sex Crimes, DUI, Burglary and Theft, Drugs, Miscellaneous Crimes, Division Law

Family Law: Closely Held Business Division Law, Divorce, Child Custody, Child Relocation, Denver Divorce Modifications, Equitable Distribution, Family Law Attorneys, Prenuptial and Postnuptial Agreements, Spousal Support

Personal Injury: Medical Negligence, Motor Vehicle Accidents, Wrongful Death and Other

Civil Litigation: Business Law, Construction Law, Real Estate Law

Appellate Practice and Insurance Defense

Serving residents of: The cities of Aurora, Lakewood, Broomfield, Washington Park, Highlands Ranch, Cherry Ridge, Littleton, Boulder, Fort Collins, Loveland, Greeley, Castle Rock and Colorado Springs, AND The counties of Denver, Douglas, Adams, Jefferson, Boulder, Arapahoe, Larimer, El Paso, Mesa, Summit, Grand and Weld, Colorado.
